mapper.insert: insert into product (product_no, name, explain, effect, food, kind, product_country, farmer_no, product_sas, delivery, is_seasonal_food, sales) values (product_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{explain}, #{effect}, #{food}, #{kind}, #{productCountry}, 1, #{productSas}, #{delivery}, #{isSeasonalFood}, #{sales})

insert into product_option(option_no, product_no, name, price, amount, quality, expiration_date) values (product_option_seq.nextval, product_seq.currval, #{name}, #{price}, #{amount}, #{quality}, #{expirationDate})
mapper.select: select p.product_no, p.name, p.explain, pp.price, pp.quality, pp.expiration_date from product p, product_option pp where p.product_no = pp.product_no and pp.product_no = #{productNo}
